name: wsa_bootstrap
description: This file contains details of the default assets used by wsa_bootstrap template, a Joomla 5 and 4 site template.

assets.name: template.wsa_bootstrap
assets.description: The css file to be used when there is no specific styleid known, will be overridden by template.min.<templatestyleid>.css.

assets.name: bootstrap.css
assets.description: The default css file to be used with bootstrap 5.3.8, (only) after it is used can be overridden in index.php by older versions

assets.name: bootstrap.theme.css
assets.description: The theme css file only used with bootstrap 3.3.7. therefore default empty url

assets.name: bootstrap.js
assets.description: The default file containing the javascript used with bootstrap 5.3.8, can be overridden by older versions

assets.name: template.wsa_bootstrap
assets.description: The file containing the javascript for this template. bootstrap has to be registered before usinf this script.

assets.name: template.wsa_bootstrap
assets.description: Default with bootstrap 5 override with older bootstrap versions in code after this is used
